title: An urban exterior that would be at home on the cover of Dwell Magazine
description: An urban exterior that would be at home on the cover of Dwell Magazine, yet very comfortable in the Bucks County landscape. Embracing the passion for repurposing, the two story home is clad in HardiePlank cement board siding and corrugated metal panels. The strong design lines are tempered by a bucolic setting of 5.5 acres of orchards, perennials, and woodlands. Sullivan Building and Design completed the new construction in 2013, presenting a 2700 square foot, one bedroom home that is comfortably spacious with inspired design. A custom made iron walkway leads to the front porch and inside to a functional entryway space, playfully outfitted with massive chalkboard clad closet doors and a colorful Eames Hang-it-all . Beyond is the Gathering Room, a bright, generous interior space featuring two story high ceilings and distinctive farm lighting fixtures. Distinguished by polished cement floors, the space features a reading alcove lined with Rakks library shelving, a linear gas fireplace and opens to the large dining area perfect for large scale entertaining or an intimate gathering place. A modern Gourmet kitchen, the centerpiece of the home, features custom made cabinetry with stunning matched grain detailing by Cider Press Woodworks. The kitchen is equipped with a suite of high end stainless steel appliances including a Wolf cooktop and oversized stainless hood, sleek soapstone countertops, and a massive eat-in waterfall island creating a dramatic effect. Enjoy a morning cup of coffee or an evening with friends on the screened-in porch offering a relaxing place to enjoy the tranquility of the private landscape. A main floor Master Suite with sliding barn door and custom walnut drawer night stands, is complete with an adjoining dressing room and spa-like master bath. The rooms are thoughtfully enhanced with built in shelving, louvered lockers for additional storage, a laundry area, and an exterior side door leading to a deck and outdoor garden shower. The second floor with exotically beautiful hardwood floors, offers a large loft for an office or possible third bedroom. A generously sized second bedroom has a beautiful Juliette balcony and treetop views. The elegantly clad hall bath features a relaxing jetted soaking tub and a seamless glass shower. Endless possibilities with the insulated unfinished walk-out basement. Stepping stones and perennial gardens lead to the two story, three car garage designed by White Dog Studios of Lambertville, complementing the home with exterior corrugated panels, solar panels and galvanized standing seam roof. Inside, options abound with an art studio, workshop, and greenhouse as well as storage on the second floor. Additional two car parking is available beneath the carport that offers covered interior access to the home. Throughout the property, the clean, design lines offer a serene simplicity that is simultaneously sophisticated. Nearby attractions include Lake Galena and Peace Valley Nature Center. Close to Doylestown s museums, local shopping and dining as well as Central Bucks Schools. Here you will find a balance of fine art, function and nature you may never want to leave!

The Academy House is located in the heart of Center City and within close walking distance to Rittenhouse Square, Washington Square, and the Broad Street and Market Street office corridors. description:
Half a block way from Rittenhouse Square Park. Roof top deck with spectacular view of the park as seen in the photos. This rental has two generously size bedrooms (11x11 and 19x8) with two full bathrooms. A garden walkway welcomes you as you enter the property through a private gated entrance. The updated kitchen boasts granite counter tops, newer stainless steel appliances and a charming back splash. The second level offers a full bath with subway tiles and pedestal sink as well as a large bedroom (19x8) with more than ample closet space and built-in shelving - this level has plenty of natural light shining through the windows. This home is just steps from Rittenhouse Square restaurants, shops, fabulous nightlife, parking garages, public transportation and everything Center City has to offer. title: Experience all of Center City's Comforts at Riverloft Apartments
description:
Experience all of Center City's Comforts at Riverloft Apartments. Let our 24-hour front desk attendant receive your guests, your deliveries, dry cleaning, or anything else you may need. Our high-rise apartment building also offers an on-site ATM and controlled access guest parking and garage parking for an additional fee. Relax in your loft-style apartment with 16-foot ceilings, 12-foot windows and stainless steel kitchen appliances. There are high-tech touches throughout Riverloft - tech bars with data and charging ports provide convenient pit stops, plus there is a tech lounge with pod seating, a gas fireplace and a Smart TV. Riverloft has free Wi-Fi in all common areas, and iPads are available for check-out at the tech bar. Work out in our 24-hour Resort-Style Fitness with state-of-the-art equipment featuring personal TVs and iPod jacks. There are also weight machines and free weights for a lower-impact workout. Located steps from Rittenhouse Square surrounded by world class dinning and shopping. Monthly rent amount varies based on move-in date, and prices subject to change on daily basis. ** Prices and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

description:
Enjoy the conveniences of city living from this sunny one bedroom, one bath unit in Society Hill Towers with all utilities included! Located on the 5th floor of the West Tower, this home features hardwood floors, walls of oversized windows, and beautiful treetop views. The kitchen is opened up to the living and dining area and features a convenient breakfast bar, gas range, dishwasher and full-sized refrigerator. A spacious bedroom features an oversized closet, and additional closets off the entryway and hall provide great storage space. Part of the I.M. Pei-designed Society Hill Towers, this home is in an esteemed condo community featuring a 24 hr front desk, renovated common lobby, laundry facilities, and guest parking lot (w/hourly metered parking). The gym, seasonal pool, and garage parking are available to residents at an additional monthly cost. Perfectly located in the heart of historic Society Hill, this home is steps away from Zahav, Ritz 5 theater, ACME, Independence Hall, Penn's Landing, Headhouse Square, and convenient to public transportation and major thoroughfares. title: WELCOME TO BRIDGEVIEW! LOCATED IN BUSTLING OLD CITY!
description:
SHORT TERM 6 MONTH LEASE. Welcome to Bridgeview! Located in bustling Old City, on a quiet cobblestone street, is a renovated, top floor loft for you to call home. The building features high quality amenities including roof deck, garage parking, 24 hour concierge service, and a thriving association of owners. Your new home, unit 616, is bathed in natural light and features the high ceilings and exposed brick walls of your dreams. Enter the unit and find ample storage by the door before moving toward the kitchen, notice the hardwood floors throughout. You’ll first find an updated kitchen with a fresh new backsplash, stainless steel appliances and tons of storage. From here, you’ll enter the open living space with plenty of room for a dining table and living room set. Notice the size of these windows! You’ll find more closet storage on the way to the full bath that features stone tile and radiant heating in the floors. Next, is the large primary bedroom with two huge windows and more exposed brick. Another closet here for additional storage. Lastly you’ll find a BONUS room that is perfect for a nursery, home office, gym, dressing room, yoga room, guest bedroom or whatever you desire to make of it! Unit 616 comes with a 3x6 storage unit on the 6th floor (near the elevator and unit). GARAGE PARKING AVAILABLE FOR ADDITIONAL $250/ MO. Easy access to the Market Frankford Line, I-95 and the Ben Franklin Bridge make this a commuter's dream and on the evenings and weekends you are in the heart of everything that Old City has to offer including tons of boutiques, coffee shops, restaurants and museums. Don’t miss your opportunity to claim this stylish home for yourself!
315 New St #616

title: Professional on-site management team, Seasonal Bike Share Program
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: Welcome to wonderful Elliger Park!!
description: Welcome to wonderful Elliger Park!! This lovely, well-kept ranch home is tucked away on a quiet “no through” street bordering township wooded parkland. Located in the popular Upper Dublin township with the sought-after Upper Dublin school district. Picturesque 0.45ac lot with mature trees and plantings plus a meandering creek at rear of property. Your own private, tranquil retreat!! Open, bright floor plan with abundant windows and vaulted ceilings. Welcoming covered “rocking chair” front porch. Cheerful living room with vaulted ceiling and pretty view of front yard. Delightful dining room with wall of book cases and pretty glass display case. Updated ‘country kitchen” with attractive greenhouse window, wrap around breakfast bar, custom ceiling fan, stainless steel back-splash, newer 5 burner gas range, Bosch dishwasher. The kitchen adjoins the inviting family room with attractive wood beams and appealing brick fireplace. Laminated wood style floors are in most of the first-floor rooms with radiant heat for extra comfort. The unique, expansive great room is a focal point of the home with its wall of windows and doors that “invites the outside in” with a nice view of the pretty back yard and patio.  The vaulted ceiling and two ceiling fans plus stunning slate floor add to the ambiance of this versatile room—possible studio, playroom, home school room or home office. There is a master suite with full bath, plus an additional two bedrooms and full bath.  Convenient laundry room off kitchen  with outside exit, cabinets and closet. For storage there are pulldown stairs to attic. There is also a nice size storage shed. Although a serene location, this special home is convenient to major roads and PA turnpike plus the train station--and the abundance of township parks. The wonderful, attractive bustling town of Amber is a short walk away with its trendy shops, variety of diverse dining and gourmet restaurants and of course the vintage Ambler theater that is a favorite of locals. Imagine living in such a lovely home in such a special location—you will be finally “home”!. CALL  show contact info
